text: The flag of Georgia (; sakartvelos sakhelmts ºipo drosha), also known as the Five Cross Flag (; khutjvriani drosha) has a white rectangle, with in its central portion a large red cross that extends to the edge of the flag. In the four corners there are four Bolnur-Katskhuri crosses of the same color. ==Notes== Georgia Category:National symbols of Georgia (country) Category:Flags introduced in 1918
title: Flag of Georgia (country)
